hha-meem
ain-seen-qaf
kadhālika yūḥī ilayka wa-ilā alladhīna min qablika al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿaliyu al-ʿaẓīmu
takādu al-samāwātu yatafaṭṭarna min fawqihinna wal-malāikatu yusabbiḥūna biḥamdi rabbihim wayastaghfirūna liman fī al-arḍi alā inna al-laha huwa al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
wa-alladhīna ittakhadhū min dūnihi awliyāa al-lahu ḥafīẓun ʿalayhim wamā anta ʿalayhim biwakīlin
wakadhālika awḥaynā ilayka qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan litundhira umma al-qurā waman ḥawlahā watundhira yawma al-jamʿi lā rayba fīhi farīqun fī al-janati wafarīqun fī al-saʿīri
walaw shāa al-lahu lajaʿalahum ummatan wāḥidatan walākin yud'khilu man yashāu fī raḥmatihi wal-ẓālimūna mā lahum min waliyyin walā naṣīrin
ami ittakhadhū min dūnihi awliyāa fal-lahu huwa al-waliyu wahuwa yuḥ'yī al-mawtā wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
wamā ikh'talaftum fīhi min shayin faḥuk'muhu ilā al-lahi dhālikumu al-lahu rabbī ʿalayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi unību
fāṭiru al-samāwāti wal-arḍi jaʿala lakum min anfusikum azwājan wamina al-anʿāmi azwājan yadhra-ukum fīhi laysa kamith'lihi shayon wahuwa al-samīʿu al-baṣīru
lahu maqālīdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru innahu bikulli shayin ʿalīmun

sharaʿa lakum mina al-dīni mā waṣṣā bihi nūḥan wa-alladhī awḥaynā ilayka wamā waṣṣaynā bihi ib'rāhīma wamūsā waʿīsā an aqīmū al-dīna walā tatafarraqū fīhi kabura ʿalā al-mush'rikīna mā tadʿūhum ilayhi al-lahu yajtabī ilayhi man yashāu wayahdī ilayhi man yunību

wamā tafarraqū illā min baʿdi mā jāahumu al-ʿil'mu baghyan baynahum walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika ilā ajalin musamman laquḍiya baynahum wa-inna alladhīna ūrithū al-kitāba min baʿdihim lafī shakkin min'hu murībin

falidhālika fa-ud'ʿu wa-is'taqim kamā umir'ta walā tattabiʿ ahwāahum waqul āmantu bimā anzala al-lahu min kitābin wa-umir'tu li-aʿdila baynakumu al-lahu rabbunā warabbukum lanā aʿmālunā walakum aʿmālukum lā ḥujjata baynanā wabaynakumu al-lahu yajmaʿu baynanā wa-ilayhi al-maṣīru
wa-alladhīna yuḥājjūna fī al-lahi min baʿdi mā us'tujība lahu ḥujjatuhum dāḥiḍatun ʿinda rabbihim waʿalayhim ghaḍabun walahum ʿadhābun shadīdun
al-lahu alladhī anzala al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi wal-mīzāna wamā yud'rīka laʿalla al-sāʿata qarībun
yastaʿjilu bihā alladhīna lā yu'minūna bihā wa-alladhīna āmanū mush'fiqūna min'hā wayaʿlamūna annahā al-ḥaqu alā inna alladhīna yumārūna fī al-sāʿati lafī ḍalālin baʿīdin
al-lahu laṭīfun biʿibādihi yarzuqu man yashāu wahuwa al-qawiyu al-ʿazīzu
man kāna yurīdu ḥartha al-ākhirati nazid lahu fī ḥarthihi waman kāna yurīdu ḥartha al-dun'yā nu'tihi min'hā wamā lahu fī al-ākhirati min naṣībin
am lahum shurakāu sharaʿū lahum mina al-dīni mā lam yadhan bihi al-lahu walawlā kalimatu al-faṣli laquḍiya baynahum wa-inna al-ẓālimīna lahum ʿadhābun alīmun
tarā al-ẓālimīna mush'fiqīna mimmā kasabū wahuwa wāqiʿun bihim wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fī rawḍāti al-janāti lahum mā yashāūna ʿinda rabbihim dhālika huwa al-faḍlu al-kabīru

dhālika alladhī yubashiru al-lahu ʿibādahu alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti qul lā asalukum ʿalayhi ajran illā al-mawadata fī al-qur'bā waman yaqtarif ḥasanatan nazid lahu fīhā ḥus'nan inna al-laha ghafūrun shakūrun
am yaqūlūna if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban fa-in yasha-i al-lahu yakhtim ʿalā qalbika wayamḥu al-lahu al-bāṭila wayuḥiqqu al-ḥaqa bikalimātihi innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
wahuwa alladhī yaqbalu al-tawbata ʿan ʿibādihi wayaʿfū ʿani al-sayiāti wayaʿlamu mā tafʿalūna
wayastajību alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti wayazīduhum min faḍlihi wal-kāfirūna lahum ʿadhābun shadīdun
walaw basaṭa al-lahu al-riz'qa liʿibādihi labaghaw fī al-arḍi walākin yunazzilu biqadarin mā yashāu innahu biʿibādihi khabīrun baṣīrun
wahuwa alladhī yunazzilu al-ghaytha min baʿdi mā qanaṭū wayanshuru raḥmatahu wahuwa al-waliyu al-ḥamīdu
wamin āyātihi khalqu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā batha fīhimā min dābbatin wahuwa ʿalā jamʿihim idhā yashāu qadīrun
wamā aṣābakum min muṣībatin fabimā kasabat aydīkum wayaʿfū ʿan kathīrin
wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna fī al-arḍi wamā lakum min dūni al-lahi min waliyyin walā naṣīrin
wamin āyātihi al-jawāri fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
in yasha yus'kini al-rīḥa fayaẓlalna rawākida ʿalā ẓahrihi inna fī dhālika laāyātin likulli ṣabbārin shakūrin
aw yūbiq'hunna bimā kasabū wayaʿfu ʿan kathīrin
wayaʿlama alladhīna yujādilūna fī āyātinā mā lahum min maḥīṣin
famā ūtītum min shayin famatāʿu al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wamā ʿinda al-lahi khayrun wa-abqā lilladhīna āmanū waʿalā rabbihim yatawakkalūna
wa-alladhīna yajtanibūna kabāira al-ith'mi wal-fawāḥisha wa-idhā mā ghaḍibū hum yaghfirūna
wa-alladhīna is'tajābū lirabbihim wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata wa-amruhum shūrā baynahum wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
wa-alladhīna idhā aṣābahumu al-baghyu hum yantaṣirūna
wajazāu sayyi-atin sayyi-atun mith'luhā faman ʿafā wa-aṣlaḥa fa-ajruhu ʿalā al-lahi innahu lā yuḥibbu al-ẓālimīna
walamani intaṣara baʿda ẓul'mihi fa-ulāika mā ʿalayhim min sabīlin
innamā al-sabīlu ʿalā alladhīna yaẓlimūna al-nāsa wayabghūna fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi ulāika lahum ʿadhābun alīmun
walaman ṣabara waghafara inna dhālika lamin ʿazmi al-umūri
waman yuḍ'lili al-lahu famā lahu min waliyyin min baʿdihi watarā al-ẓālimīna lammā ra-awū al-ʿadhāba yaqūlūna hal ilā maraddin min sabīlin

watarāhum yuʿ'raḍūna ʿalayhā khāshiʿīna mina al-dhuli yanẓurūna min ṭarfin khafiyyin waqāla alladhīna āmanū inna al-khāsirīna alladhīna khasirū anfusahum wa-ahlīhim yawma al-qiyāmati alā inna al-ẓālimīna fī ʿadhābin muqīmin
wamā kāna lahum min awliyāa yanṣurūnahum min dūni al-lahi waman yuḍ'lili al-lahu famā lahu min sabīlin
is'tajībū lirabbikum min qabli an yatiya yawmun lā maradda lahu mina al-lahi mā lakum min malja-in yawma-idhin wamā lakum min nakīrin

fa-in aʿraḍū famā arsalnāka ʿalayhim ḥafīẓan in ʿalayka illā al-balāghu wa-innā idhā adhaqnā al-insāna minnā raḥmatan fariḥa bihā wa-in tuṣib'hum sayyi-atun bimā qaddamat aydīhim fa-inna al-insāna kafūrun
lillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yakhluqu mā yashāu yahabu liman yashāu ināthan wayahabu liman yashāu al-dhukūra
aw yuzawwijuhum dhuk'rānan wa-ināthan wayajʿalu man yashāu ʿaqīman innahu ʿalīmun qadīrun
wamā kāna libasharin an yukallimahu al-lahu illā waḥyan aw min warāi ḥijābin aw yur'sila rasūlan fayūḥiya bi-idh'nihi mā yashāu innahu ʿaliyyun ḥakīmun
wakadhālika awḥaynā ilayka rūḥan min amrinā mā kunta tadrī mā al-kitābu walā al-īmānu walākin jaʿalnāhu nūran nahdī bihi man nashāu min ʿibādinā wa-innaka latahdī ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
ṣirāṭi al-lahi alladhī lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi alā ilā al-lahi taṣīru al-umūru
